channel.title: Hit-a-Hint on Luca Bruno blog
channel.description: Recent content in Hit-a-Hint on Luca Bruno blog

item.title: Gtk3 hit-a-hint: mouseless navigation module
item.description: I present gtkhah, a gtk module for hit-a-hint mouseless navigation of gtk3 applications. It’s been inspired by the various hit-a-hint browser extensions. Usage at the project homepage. Here’s a quick screenshot of Gedit:
